overview: A heart-thumping tale told in 24 hours that dives deep into the lives of a law enforcement agent, a young man and some rogue elements. It explores the seedy underbelly of rogue law enforcement officers and the atrocious results as they collide head on with a frustrated young man and a conflicted member of the police force. Itâ€™s a race against time in a haze of palpable tension, a powder keg tethering on the brink of imminent combustion.
title: Collision Course
